// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float4x4 ScreenToShadowMatrix;
//   float4 ShadowBufferAndTexelSize;
//   sampler2D ShadowDepthTexture;
//   float ShadowOverrideFactor;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c0       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   ScreenToShadowMatrix         c7       4
//   DNEResolution                c11      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c12      1
//   ShadowBufferAndTexelSize     c13      1
//   ShadowOverrideFactor         c14      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture           s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 0, 2, 1, 0.5
    def c2, -9.99999997e-007, 200, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v1
    dcl_texcoord7 v2.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13

    nrm_pp r0.xyz, v1
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v0
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0.z, c1.xxyw, -r0
    texld_pp r2, c1.zwzw, s0
    if b0
      mad r2.yz, vPos.xxyw, c11.xxyw, c11.xzww
      mul r2.yz, r2, v2.w
      mul r3, r2.z, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_7605B136_0.txt
add r8.w, v1.w, -r8.y
mad r2.y, -r8.w, r8.x, r2.y

      mad r3, c7, r2.y, r3
      mad r3, c9, v1.w, r3
      mad r3, c10, v2.w, r3
      rcp r0.w, r3.w
      mul r2.yz, r0.w, r3.xxyw
      texld r4, r2.yzzw, s1
      mov r5.xz, c1
      mad r5, c13.wwzw, r5.xzzx, r2.yzyz
      texld r6, r5, s1
      texld r5, r5.zwzw, s1
      mad r3.xy, r3, r0.w, c13.zwzw
      texld r7, r3, s1
      mov r4.y, r6.x
      mov r4.z, r5.x
      mov r4.w, r7.x
      add r3, r3.z, -r4
      cmp r4, r3, c1.x, c1.z
      mul r2.yz, r2, c13.xxyw
      frc r2.yz, r2
      cmp r3.xy, r3, -c1.x, -c1.z
      add r3.xy, r3, r4.zwzw
      mad r2.yw, r2.y, r3.xxzy, r4.xxzy
      lrp r0.w, r2.z, r2.w, r2.y
      mul r0.w, r0.w, c14.x
      mul_pp r2.yzw, r0.w, r2.x
    else
      mov_pp r2.yzw, r2.x
    endif
    add_pp r3.xyz, c5, c5.w
    mov_sat_pp r0.w, r1.z
    add r1.w, r0.w, c2.x
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c0.w
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r0, r1
    add r0.y, r0.x, c2.x
    pow_pp r1.x, r0.x, c2.y
    mul r0.x, r1.x, c0.x
    mul r1.xyz, r0.w, c4
    cmp r1.xyz, r1.w, r1, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xzw, r3.xyyz, r0.x
    cmp_pp r0.xyz, r0.y, r0.xzww, c1.x
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0, r1
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r2.yzww, r0
    mul oC0.xyz, r0, c12
    mov_pp oC0.w, c1.x

// approximately 60 instruction slots used (5 texture, 55 arithmetic)
